ConfigInfo.Name: StmExposedConfig 2
ConfigInfo.MethodologyDescription: Prototype bringing up agents using autodeployment.

Children.Name: Connect to Controller and Create Session

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Connect to Controller and Create Session

Properties.Name: Text
Properties.Value: Add the CS_IteratorState table so result queries will work

Children.Name: Run SQL Command (Set up Iterator State Table)

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Run SQL Command (Set up Iterator State Table)

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_IteratorState (Iteration INTEGER, CurrVal VARCHAR)
INSERT INTO CS_IteratorState (Iteration, CurrVal) VALUES (1, 1)

Children.Name: Run SQL Command (Set up CS_DeploymentEvents table)

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Run SQL Command (Set up CS_DeploymentEvents table)

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_DeploymentEvents (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Time REAL, MachineSetHnd INTEGER, MachineSetName VARCHAR, Event VARCHAR)
INSERT INTO CS_IteratorState (Iteration, CurrVal) VALUES (1, 1)

Children.Name: Test Methodology: Process Data Command - Copy SecurityToken to DB

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Test Methodology: Process Data Command - Copy SecurityToken to DB

sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE CS_GlobalConfig (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, EnableEotDeleteInstances STRING, EnableCpuLoad STRING)

ExpProperties.EpDescription: Enable deletion of auto-deployed instances at the end of the test.
ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 411
ExpProperties.EpDisplayName: Enable Delete Instances On End Of Test

ExpProperties.EpDescription: Enable generation of CPU Load on deployed agents.
ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 411

Children.Name: Initialize Real Time Results (Instance Deployment Events)

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Initialize Real Time Results (Instance Deployment Events)

ExpressionCommand.Name: Run SQL: If Enabled Auto-Deployed Instance Cleanup

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Run SQL: If Enable Auto-Deployed Instance Cleanup

sql_statement.static: SELECT CASE WHEN EnableEotDeleteInstances = '0' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM CS_GlobalConfig

Children.Name: Initialize Real Time Results (Instance Tear Down Events)

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Initialize Real Time Results (Instance Tear Down Events)

sql_statement.static: SELECT CASE WHEN EnableCpuLoad='0' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM CS_GlobalConfig

Children.Name: Test Methodology: Process Data Command - Copy SecurityToken to Init RT Results

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Test Methodology: Process Data Command - Copy SecurityToken to Init RT Results

sql_statement.static: SELECT SecurityToken FROM CS_SecurityToken

bll_object_property.description: Set the correct CS security token in the real time results input (for URL construction).
Set the correct CS security token in the real time results input (for influx db query).

Children.Name: Initialize Real Time Results (Summary CPU Speedometers)

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Initialize Real Time Results (Summary CPU Speedometers)

influx_db_query.static: SELECT ip_address, last(actual) FROM cs_agent_cpu WHERE session='

Children.Name: Test Methodology: Process Data Command - Set events table name

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Test Methodology: Process Data Command - Set events table name

sql_statement.static: SELECT 'CS_AUTO_DEPLOY_cs_bll_events_' || SecurityToken FROM CS_SecurityToken

Children.Name: Test Methodology: Process Data Command - Write event to Influx DB

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: Test Methodology: Process Data Command - Write event to Influx DB

sql_statement.static: SELECT SecToken.SecurityToken AS SessionId, 'Event' AS Event, 'EventDescription' AS EventDescription, 'Event Text Short' AS EventTextShort, 'Event Text' AS EventText, CAST(34.567 * 10000 AS INTEGER) AS CpuLoadAcceptableVarianceInt FROM CS_SecurityToken AS SecToken

ExpProperties.EpDescription: Maximum amount of time to wait for a response from the provider when a command is issued.
ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 411

ExpProperties.EpDescription: Amount of time to wait between polls to check for the provider's response to a command.
ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 411

ExpProperties.EpDescription: Maximum amount of time to wait for auto-deployed agents to come up.  This maximum applies to agents of a specific Template or a specific batch of agents on a specific Template if BatchSize is non-zero.
ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 411

ExpProperties.EpDescription: Amount of time to wait between polls to check for the number of agents have successfully been deployed for a specific Template or a specific batch of agents on a specific Template if BatchSize is non-zero.
ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 411

ExpProperties.EpDescription: Maximum number of agents to attempt at any one time.  Note that the MachineSets are already deployed serially; the BatchSize further breaks up the agents in a MachineSet to reduce the load on the server.  Set the BatchSize to zero to deploy all agents on a MachineSet as fast as possible.
ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 411

sql_statement.static: SELECT Time AS Time, MachineSetHnd AS MachineSetHnd, (SELECT MS.Name FROM MachineSet AS MS WHERE MS.Handle = MachineSetHnd) AS MachineSetName, Event AS Event FROM CS_MachineSetDeploy_events
SELECT ID, MachineSetName, MachineSetHnd, Time, ROUND(Time - (SELECT Time FROM CS_MachineSetDeploy_events WHERE ID=1), 2) AS NormalizedTime, Event FROM CS_MachineSetDeploy_events
SELECT ID, MachineSetName, MachineSetHnd, Time, ROUND(Time - (SELECT Time FROM CS_MachineSetDeploy_timing WHERE ID=1), 2) AS NormalizedTime, Count FROM CS_MachineSetDeploy_timing
SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(DeployVerdict) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN (DeployedCount < DeployCount) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS DeployVerdict FROM CS_MachineSetDeployedAgents)

Children.Name: RunSql (Generate the error description and fail the test)

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: RunSql (Generate the error description and fail the test)

report.explanation: Failed to deploy agents on one or more Machine Sets.

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Was unable to deploy agents on one or more machine sets within the time allotted.

sql_statement.static: SELECT MachineSetHnd, MachineSetName, DeployCount, DeployedCount FROM CS_MachineSetDeployedAgents WHERE DeployedCount < DeployCount

Children.Name: CloudStress: Reserve Machine Set Agents Command 1

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: CloudStress: Reserve Machine Set Agents Command 1

sql_statement.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT SUM(MS.Count) FROM MachineSet AS MS) != (SELECT COUNT (*) AS ResCount FROM (SELECT RT.SourceHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI WHERE Type='AffiliatedCloudStressSession' AND CTI.Handle = RT.SourceHnd)) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Children.Name: RunSql (Generate the error description and fail the test)

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: RunSql (Generate the error description and fail the test)

report.explanation: Failed to reserve agents on one or more templates.

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Was unable to reserve agents on one or more templates.

sql_statement.static: SELECT CMD.Status AS 'Reserve Status' FROM RelationTable AS RT, Tag AS Tag, spirent_cloudstress_ReserveMachineSetAgentsCommand AS CMD WHERE RT.Type='UserTag' AND Tag.Name='ReserveMachineSetAgentsCommand' AND Tag.Handle=RT.TargetHnd AND CMD.Handle=RT.SourceHnd

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Was unable to auto-deploy and reserve the requested number of instances.
report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: Successfully auto-deployed and reserved the requested number of instances.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT SUM(MS.Count) FROM MachineSet AS MS) < (SELECT COUNT (*) AS ResCount FROM (SELECT RT.SourceHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI WHERE Type='AffiliatedCloudStressSession' AND CTI.Handle = RT.SourceHnd)) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

sql_statement.static: SELECT CTI.Name, CTI.Handle, CTI.ResId FROM RelationTable AS RT, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI WHERE Type='AffiliatedCloudStressSession' AND CTI.Handle = RT.SourceHnd
SELECT CASE WHEN EnableCpuLoad='0' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM CS_GlobalConfig

Children.Name: CloudStress: Tear Down CloudStress Agents Command

Properties.Name: Name
Properties.Value: CloudStress: Tear Down CloudStress Agents Command

ExpProperties.EpDescription: Maximum amount of time to wait for a response from the provider when a command is issued.
ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 411

ExpProperties.EpDescription: Amount of time to wait between polls to check for the provider's response to a command.
ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 411

ExpProperties.EpDescription: Specifies the maximum time in seconds to wait to for all the deployed agents of the MachineSet to be torn down.  When the BatchSize is non-zero, this parameter corresponds to the maximum wait time per batch of agents per MachineSet.
ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 411

ExpProperties.EpDescription: Specifies the time in milliseconds to wait between polls while polling for number of agents that are still up.  Note that each poll for number of agents that are up involves issuing a command to the provider to get the current number of agents that are still up.
ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 411

ExpProperties.EpDescription: Maximum number of agents to attempt at any one time.  Note that the MachineSets are already deployed serially; the BatchSize further breaks up the agents in a MachineSet to reduce the load on the server.  Set the BatchSize to zero to tear down all agents on a MachineSet as fast as possible.
ExpProperties.Name: StmExposedProperty 411

sql_statement.static: SELECT Time AS Time, MachineSetHnd AS MachineSetHnd, (SELECT MS.Name FROM MachineSet AS MS WHERE MS.Handle = MachineSetHnd) AS MachineSetName, Event AS Event FROM CS_MachineSetTearDown_events

Frontend.EpDescription: Maximum amount of time to wait for a response from the provider when a command is issued.
Frontend.Name: StmExposedProperty 411

Frontend.EpDescription: Amount of time to wait between polls to check for the provider's response to a command.
Frontend.Name: StmExposedProperty 411
